name: Rocko's Modern Life: Spunky's Dangerous Day
name_original: Rocko's Modern Life: Spunky's Dangerous Day
description: Rocko's Modern Life: Spunky's Dangerous Day is a Super Nintendo Entertainment System video game released in the United States on April 1, 1994 and in 1997 in Canada, and is based on Joe Murray's Rocko's Modern Life television series on Nickelodeon. It was developed by Viacom New Media.
